title: 博客初始化

content:
Hi there👋, I’m a Strive236.
I’m a software engineering student from Xi’an JiaoTong University.
I’m passionate about all things interesting.
Recently, I have been learning algorithms and preparing for further study.
Feel free to contact me by email.
